name: product_id
description: Fetches product details from the AliExpress API using the provided product ID and optional parameters.

is_id.description: The ID of the product to fetch details for.

locale.description: The locale to be used for the request (e.g., 'en_US').

name: product_by_id
description: Fetches detailed information about a specific product from the AliExpress API using the provided product ID.

product_id.description: The unique identifier for the product on AliExpress.

name: getproductbycategory
description: Retrieves products from a given category using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

category.description: The category of the product to search for.

name: feedbacks_id
description: Fetches feedbacks for a given product ID from the AliExpress unofficial API.

is_id.description: The product ID for which feedbacks are to be fetched.

withpictures.description: Indicates whether to include feedbacks with pictures (1 by default).

page.description: Specifies the page number of feedback results to fetch (1 by default).

name: search_on_ebay
description: Searches for items on eBay using the provided search query and RapidAPI key.

searchquery.description: The search term used to look for items on eBay.

name: search_for_creators
description: Search for creators on Patreon using the given search query.

search_query.description: The search term used to query creators on Patreon.

name: listoforders
description: Executes an HTTP GET request to the Ecombr marketplace API for seller orders with the provided parameters and returns the response.

token.description: Authentication token for the Ecombr API.

e_mail.description: Email address associated with the seller account.

status.description: Status of the orders to filter.

action.description: The action to be performed on the orders.

name: getproductbyname
description: Fetches product information for a specific brand from the products database via the Cartify API.

brand.description: The name of the brand to filter products by.

name: smart_phones
description: Fetches data of smart phones from the Amazon API using optional brand filtering.

name_brand.description: The brand name to filter the smart phones. Defaults to None.

name: headphones
description: This function retrieves information about headphones from the Amazon API using optional brand filtering.

name_brand.description: The brand name to filter headphones by. Defaults to None.

name: getthelistofcountriesregistered
description: Fetches a list of countries registered on the ecombr.com marketplace using the provided API credentials and parameters.

action.description: The specific action to be executed by the API.

content_type.description: The content type of the API request.

cache_control.description: The cache control settings for the API request.

secret.description: The secret key for authenticating the API request.

token.description: The token for validating the API request.

e_mail.description: The email associated with the API account.

name: laptops
description: Retrieves information about laptops from the Amazon API using optional brand name filtering.

name_brand.description: The brand name to filter the laptops by. If not provided, all laptop brands will be considered.

name: products_id
description: Fetches product information from AliExpress using the given product ID and various optional filters.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the product on AliExpress.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Default is 1.

currency.description: The currency code to use for the prices.

sort.description: The sorting order for the search results.

pricemax.description: The maximum price limit for filtering. Default is 100.

country.description: The country code for filtering the products based on shipping.

pricemin.description: The minimum price limit for filtering. Default is 20.

issale.description: Filter to show only products on sale.

locale.description: The locale code for the results.

isfreeship.description: Filter to show only products with free shipping.

isfavorite.description: Filter to show only favorite products.

name: shipping_id
description: Fetches shipping information from the AliExpress Unofficial API for a given shipping ID and optional parameters such as count, locale, country, and currency.

is_id.description: The ID of the shipping information to fetch.

count.description: The count of shipping records to fetch. Defaults to 1.

locale.description: Locale for the shipping information. Defaults to None.

country.description: Country for the shipping information. Defaults to None.

currency.description: Currency for the shipping information. Defaults to None.

name: hot_products
description: Fetch hot products from AliExpress based on a search term and optional maximum price.

search_value.description: The search term used to find hot products on AliExpress.

max_price.description: The maximum price for the product searches. Defaults to 10000.

name: gst
description: Verifies a GST (Goods and Services Tax) number using the GST Advance API.

gst.description: The GST number to be verified.

name: bcaa
description: Fetches Branched-Chain Amino Acids (BCAA) product details from Amazon API.

product_name_brand.description: Name or brand of the BCAA product to look up. Default is None.
